scripts.generate: npx prisma generate --schema ./prisma-profiles/schema.prisma --no-engine && npx prisma generate --schema ./prisma-servers/schema.prisma --no-engine
scripts.migrate: npx prisma migrate dev --schema ./prisma-profiles/schema.prisma && npx prisma migrate dev --schema ./prisma-servers/schema.prisma
scripts.deploy: npx prisma migrate deploy --schema ./prisma-profiles/schema.prisma && npx prisma migrate deploy --schema ./prisma-servers/schema.prisma
